Uses of Class
tripleplay.anim.Animation.One

  • Packages that use Animation.One 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.anim  

    • Uses of Animation.One in tripleplay.anim

      Methods in tripleplay.anim that return Animation.One 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Animation.One Animation.One.from​(float value)
      Configures the starting value.
      Animation.One Animation.One.to​(float value)
      Configures the ending value.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tween​(Animation.Value value)
      Starts a tween using the supplied custom value.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenAlpha​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's transparency.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenRotation​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's rotation.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenScale​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x/y-scale.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenScaleX​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x-scale.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenScaleY​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's y-scale.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenVolume​(playn.core.Sound sound)
      Tweens the volume of the supplied sound.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenVolume​(Playable sound)
      Tweens the volume of the supplied playable.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenX​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's x-translation.
      Animation.One AnimBuilder.tweenY​(playn.scene.Layer layer)
      Starts a tween on the supplied layer's y-translation.
